documents.document: Good to see media coverage of Higgins by @The_RiotACT Please read @Gordon_R_Ramsay @YvetteSBerry @canberratimes https://t.co/V32pxYUMBL
After watching Trump news yesterday, calming therapy is: Anders Roland & Finn Olafsson guitar "Back to the present" cd. Relief.
I tried to think of what to tweet Trumpy, but all I can think of is "enter hamar". @realDonaldTrump
Terrible service from Beacon Lighting Gungahlin. Ordered & paid on phone, they said pick up, but when pick up, a big stuff up.Waste of time.
Need one of these in West Belco for 45,000 humans. Tight, cosy squeeze... VJ @canberratimes @fischerkim https://t.co/Ekat1S59ZV
Is it legal to gamble/bet on: will Kippax get weekend blue rapid buses before the 2 tram lines are finished? We could maybe bet on it...
Are there plans for a weekend blue rapid bus to Kippax, as I have requested from the ACT government? What is the truth? @Transport_CBR
Will Kippax get a weekend blue rapid bus in 2017 or not? Your office said probably yes in 2016, but now I hear no.Truth? @MeeganFitzMLA
Is it acceptable that West Belco is the only area without any of the new drink fountains in CBR? Why? @MeeganFitzMLA @Gordon_R_Ramsay

Funny how the ALP keep West Belco so under resourced,then assemble Christmas hampers- so offensive/patronising.Fund the area @canberratimes
2 tram lines for Canberra but Higgins playground water bubbler not fixed and no new water fountains for West Belco. Povo CBR @canberratimes
Do the children of Higgins deserve a broken water bubbler in Hudson st playground? I asked politicians to fix. Poverty land. @canberratimes
I think the ALP want to keep West Belco run down and povo- no new water fountains, no weekend rapid buses. @canberratimes @YvetteSBerry
I wonder if West Belco will get any of the new water fountains in 2017. I have asked all politicians for my area. @ABarrMLA @Gordon_R_Ramsay
I wonder if local Labor politicians will fix the water bubbler in my local playground? It does not work. @Gordon_R_Ramsay @YvetteSBerry

It's so hot...
The seeds I planted on New Year's Day have come up- 2 days ago. Simple pleasures.
@Tiffany_King @SBS I am going ok with choc as no resolution was made! But English mince pie enjoyment has gone well...
@mrngunnawal @andrewwhiteau I was serious!
@andrewwhiteau I think we should start it. A tribute to George Michael & Olive Cotton's "Max After Surfing" photo! I'd be happy to judge!!
@andrewwhiteau Gay men might like a male wet tshirt comp- a good tourist draw card... or topless...
@andrewwhiteau Oh, what a shame. I thought, in the name of equality, it might drag me there for the first time ever!!!! Good idea though!
@andrewwhiteau can women watch, or is it only men, for men to watch?
so, men wear the tshirts?! or no shirts?! https://t.co/dXqd7YIaIG
wow, they included a couple of Belco ones.... https://t.co/sjZXSlvcly
@AdamSpenceAU I don't think I'd be able to breathe, going by all the pics...like Parramatta Road.

I think all of Canberra's Greek biscuit gifts have been given to me via a neighbour. Hard to resist. New Year cake, baklava, shortbread. umm
I am sorry re your aircon @Elias_Hallaj . You can tell me re a good one from your research.
@AdamSpenceAU I just let a kid use one of those, an old one of mine- works fine. Cool and simple. #retrocool
I am really missing rapid buses out here in the sticks. We are on the so slow weekend timetable here in CBR. @Transport_CBR @MeeganFitzMLA
@SachaBlumen I remember a school mate who'd get bashed up, as gay and he copied Boy George hair dos. I hope times have changed so much...
A bit like waiting for a Sunday bus to West Belco!! VJ https://t.co/p6Br9qoOf4
After shopping at Belco today, I went to bus stop. Had to wait 40 mins for bus to my area. Need blue rapid asap to Kippax. @MeeganFitzMLA
It would help the city & Belco economy if people from West Belco could get blue rapid buses to Belco and Civic on weekends. @MeeganFitzMLA
Really wanted to go into Civic by bus yesterday- but no rapids Kippax to Civic on Sat/Sun. When will Kippax get blue rapids? @MeeganFitzMLA

Good to see focus on buses but what about a weekend blue rapid bus to Kippax? @Transport_CBR @ABarrMLA @alistair_coe https://t.co/UGctU4HY15

good fitness idea, whatever else it achieves https://t.co/ZPUN0b3nTL
@mrngunnawal @SimonHayHealer They made fabric for dolls from old blankets, and dyed fabric with plants and car parts for colour- v hipster!!

@mrngunnawal @SimonHayHealer Did you see abc program re dolls made by artists in ?NT
@mrngunnawal @SimonHayHealer need blokey ones for teen boys who think hats are uncool!! says a Mum!

I know Inner North is getting the tram but I have to say: Kippax rapid buses every 10 mins are better than Lyneham city buses every 30 mins.

@magsgboro she's just looking for votes. being Trumpish. sadly, it works...
@OwenJones84 Pizza Hut? Turkish Pide is better. We have many local ones :-P
I went to Tilley's today & asked which cakes are locally made.They said all from Sydney boo hoo.Local is better. I want local cakes in cafes
@SachaBlumen @AdamSpenceAU The south are very vocal complaining on fb ct, but they get weekend rapid blue buses! Marginal seats- good idea.

For International Day with Disability I hope for 1. Blue weekend rapids to Kippax 2. Bus shelters all main streets in CBR. @canberratimes
@MarkusMannheim A blind man said he's sick of getting rained on, many would benefit from bus shelters (city gets tram...) and free to get.
@MarkusMannheim Please see text link I sent re ad bus shelters. Ad co build for free if they can put ads in them. Non drivers would benefit
These texts sum up bus needs. Include re disability. https://t.co/tcvGyygi9m and https://t.co/Tkt70H28t0 @MarkusMannheim @canberratimes
If the CT is doing a disability supplement, why not discuss weekend bus rapids to Kippax & building free ad bus shelters? @MarkusMannheim
Beautiful coolish weather at 5.22 am. Now, can it stay like this all day?!

@mrngunnawal @woolworths @Coles Then every Xmas, people can bake gifts & Xmas food. There's only so much people can eat!
@mrngunnawal @woolworths @Coles If you bake, then flour etc not expensive. Fun to make, get someone to teach others baking skills.
@mrngunnawal @woolworths @Coles I was thinking: why not bake Xmas shaped biscuits- good to eat & wrap nicely as gifts for family/friends.
@mrngunnawal @woolworths @Coles @joewilliams_tew some extended families only give to kids and not adults. Have cash limits on kid gifts too
@mrngunnawal @woolworths @Coles @joewilliams_tew What do people need? Sometimes good to reject the consumerism, some ppl only give to kids
